install.name: JFusion Activity Module
install.author: JFusion Development Team
install.description: This is the JFusion activity module, that displays the latest posts from the integrated forum software.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: JFusionPlugins
param.label: JFusion Plugin
param.description: Which JFusion plugin should be used to display the activity for?

param.name: mode
param.label: Mode
param.description: Mode of operation. What type of threads/posts to show

param.name: linktype
param.label: Link Type
param.description: If Mode is LAT, show thread link or post link?

param.name: display_body
param.label: Display body instead of subject
param.description: Mode of display. Do you want the message subject to be replaced with the message body?

param.name: lxt_type
param.label: LAT/LCT Display First Topic Post or Last one?
param.description: In LAT/LCT mode, do you want me to display the last post made to that topic, or from the topic post itself?

param.name: forum_mode
param.label: Forums
param.description: Select the mode which will be used when deciding which forums to include in the activity search.

param.name: selected_forums
param.label: Forum selection
param.description: Select the forums you wish to use for the activity module.

param.name: display_limit
param.label: Display character limit
param.description: How many characters to display as subject or body. Use 0 for no limit (if you are hardcore that is...)

param.name: custom_date
param.label: Custom date format string
param.description: If you leave this blank, the system date string from joomla will be used. If you don't want that, enter a date format according to php's strftime() function

param.name: tz_offset
param.label: Custom timezone offset
param.description: This field describes the offset from the phpbb database time in hours. For example if your server is GMT and you are GMT+1, then you enter '1' here. If your timezone and your server are alike, set this to '0'

param.name: result_order
param.label: Result order
param.description: Order of your resulting list. ASCending or DESCending.

param.name: showdate
param.label: Show date
param.description: Show the date of each thread

param.name: showuser
param.label: Show user
param.description: Show the name of the user who posted the thread

param.name: userlink
param.label: Username link type
param.description: Link the displayed username to phpbb user profile
